fieldType.description: Metadata about a particular name field for constructing an input UI.

name.description: The standard English name of this field for this country

required.description: Whether or not this phone field is required

validation.description: Information to use to validate values of this field

pattern.description: A regular expression that will match valid values intended to be used to validate free-form inputs

aliases.description: A list of possible aliases for this field and the normalized value that they map to

fieldTypes.description: Give the mapping from fields to their types

streetAddress.description: The street and premises number of the phone

building.description: The building name or number of the phone

locality.description: The name of the city/town/village of this phone

dependentLocality.description: The name of the dependent (sub) locality of this phone

region.description: The name of the state/province/etc. of this phone

subregion.description: The name of the subregion of this phone

subsubregion.description: The name of the subsubregion of this phone

postalCode.description: The postal code/postcode/zip code of the phone

postOffice.description: The name of the post office of the phone

country.description: The name of the country of this phone
